content: Task 4: Treasury Admin Controllers and Routes
Write tests for Admin::ReimbursementRequestsController with approval workflows
Create Admin::ReimbursementRequestsController with dashboard and approval actions
Add admin routes for treasury management to config/routes.rb
Implement approve, reject, request_info, and mark_paid actions
Add Turbo Stream responses for real-time status updates
Integrate audit trail logging for all admin actions
Verify all admin controller tests pass
